data.comment: James Linington starts the match. Norwich with the kick-off in Bournemouth.
Goal! Arnaut Danjuma gives Bournemouth a 1-0 lead in Bournemouth.
In the minute 36, Kenny McLean is booked for the away team.
James Linington blows to end the first-half.
James Linington blows to start the second-half. Bournemouth with the kick-off.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Dominic Solanke with Joshua King.
Mario Vrancic is replacing Kenny McLean for Norwich at Vitality Stadium.
Diego Rico Salguero (Bournemouth) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a second substitution, with Adam Idah replacing Onel Hernandez.
Jason Tindall is making the team's second substitution at Vitality Stadium with Dan Gosling replacing Philip Billing.
The away team have replaced Lukas Rupp with Jordan Hugill. This is the third substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Arnaut Danjuma with Sam Surridge. This is the third substitution made today by Jason Tindall.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
